name: 布莉安娜·怀特
name_full: 布莉安娜·怀特 Briana White

last_movies.title: 犯罪心理：穿越国界 第二季

introduction: Briana White is a professional actress and digital content creator. She has succeeded in all worlds of performing, with credits such as Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping, Criminal Minds: Beyond Borders and as the lead in hit indie feature, Occupants, which has earned her 12 Best Actress Wins. She is the voice of lead character Aerith Gainsborough in the video game Final Fantasy VII Remake. She can be seen in commercials for Acura, CreditKarma, BCBG, and Cuff, which was featured on Good Morning America. She has been in digital content creation since her appearance in viral hit, Princess Rap Battle: Snow vs Elsa, with over 200+ million views. She founded her own video game YouTube channel, Strange Rebel Gaming, and has built a loyal and wildly engaged viewer base of over 150,000+ with over 10+ million views across Twitch, Twitter, Facebook and Instagram. She is also an experienced live host, with appearances in ArcadeCloud from Omnia Media, Machinima's Game Night, Game the Game from Geek & Sundry, and Oculus Rift on Facebook. Her acting background is rooted in her entire life of community theater from her hometown of Orange County,
